typeProperties.script:
section Section1; shared #"stationdata" = let AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://njlabfiles.blob.core.windows.net/babs/data/201508_station_data.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=b4%2B5BGMST0bKbsybBsw6KQB%2F8tgGBAFAukLxQUB1Kyg%3D&spr=https&se=2019-11-08T12%3A41%3A55Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]), TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)) in TrimmedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = stationdata,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"dockcount", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed column type", {"station_id"}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Removed columns", {"landmark"}, {{"Stations", each Table.RowCount(_), type number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";
